BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.61, and Assembly Member Clark, A.26, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to a fine for parked or unattended semitrailers or trailers on streets of a city with a population of one million or more”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Fines for parked or unattended semi-trailers (S.61, A.26).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.2414, and Assembly Member Seminerio, A.4529, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the crediting of prior service by the fire department pension fund of such city”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Crediting prior service by the fire department pension fund (S.2414, A.4529).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Lanza, S.4239, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.7336, “AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the suspension of certain employees in cities having a population of one million or more”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Suspension of certain employees in cities having a population of one million or more (S.4239, A.7336).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.5739, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.6171, “AN ACT to authorize certain employees to elect participation in an optional retirement plan”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Elect participation in an optional retirement plan (S.5739, A.6171).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.3315, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.5781, “AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to suspension of employees of the department of parks in cities having a population of one million or more”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Suspension of parks department employees in cities with one million plus population (S.3315, A.5781).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Smith, S.1861, and Assembly Member Cook, A.3548, “AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interest in certain real property acquired by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of Queens to former owner Morris Brown Church, notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which application may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 12048, Lot No. 85 on tax map for the borough of Queens”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: In rem, Morris Brown Church, block 12048, Lot 85, Queens (S.1861, A.3548).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.5382, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.4465, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to health insurance coverage for surviving spouses of members of the fire department engaged in performing emergency medical services in the city of New York who are enrolled in a health insurance plan”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Health insurance coverage for surviving spouses of EMS workers of FDNY.

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.3994, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.6542, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the employment of retired New York city police personnel”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Employment of retired NYPD personnel.

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.2486, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.4704, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to accidental disability for certain members of the New York city employees’ retirement system or the New York city board of education retirement system”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Accidental disability for certain members of NYCERS & BERS.

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Lanza, S.3596, and Assembly Member Tobacco, A.7496, “AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interests in certain real property accrued April 4, 1984 by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of Staten Island to Joan Noordzy notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which applications may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 5659, Lot No. 32, on tax map for the borough of Staten Island”.
